name: apix/cache
description: A thin PSR-6 cache wrapper with a generic interface to various caching backends emphasising cache taggging and indexing.

suggest.ext-apc: Allows to cache into APC data store ~ up to PHP 5.4.
suggest.ext-apcu: Allows to use APCu userland caching ~ any PHP version.
suggest.ext-redis: So you can cache into Redis servers.
suggest.ext-mongo: Allows to cache into MongoDB instances.
suggest.ext-memcache: Allows to use Memcache distributed memory caching system
suggest.ext-memcached: Allows to use Memcached distributed memory caching system
suggest.ext-pdo: Allows to cache into PDO supported DBs.
